effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. It confuses the target if it hits.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. It confuses the target if it hits.
